publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-510.1 Henry McLeish: Review of Scottish Enterprise—As an amendment to motion (S1M-510) in the name of Nick Johnston, leave out from "calls upon" to end and insert "supports the Executive’s publication of a consultation paper seeking views on the future of the enterprise networks as part of its drive to encourage a more entrepreneurial culture in Scotland and to provide a modern framework for economic development."
